00062 #ifndef __INTERVAL_H
00063 #define __INTERVAL_H

00065 class Interval
00066 {
00067   private:
00068     double   lower;
00069     double   upper;
00070 
00071   public:
00072     Interval ( )                      { lower = upper = 0;      }
00073     Interval ( double lo )            { lower = upper = lo;     }
00074     Interval ( double lo, double hi ) { lower = lo; upper = hi; }
00075 
00076     double   lowerBound ( ) const     { return lower;           }
00077     double   upperBound ( ) const     { return upper;           }
00078     double   width      ( ) const     { return upper - lower;   }
00079 };

00081 #endif /* !__INTERVAL_H */
